EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Quote on Dental Implant Fees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
We have several people with this exact question. There are various conditions that can affect the fee. Some detailed questions need to be asked and answered:
· How many teeth are missing/loose? · What area of the mouth are they missing/loose in? · What is the condition of the bone? · What is the condition of the soft tissue? · What is the condition of the remaining teeth? · What teeth, if any, do you want to save? · What type of dental appliance do you have? A partial denture, full denture, fixed bridge?
I will be happy to verbally give you some ranges over the phone. Unfortunately, only the doctor can put fees in writing after studying your x-ray and doing a definitive treatment plan.
Please call me today at 1-888-654-4675 and I can help to give you a ballpark of cost or I’ll set you up for a free consultation and panoramic x-ray.
Sincerely, {!Lead.OwnerFullName} Dental implant Consultant ClearChoice Dental Implant Center
